Table of Contents

Module: Linux pyVC/Networks/Linux.py

Package containing the Network object for a Linux virtual network.

This package contains a single object, Helper. It implements the methods to control and configure a Linux virtual network on a real Machine.

A Linux virtual network uses the TUN device to tunnel IP traffic over an existing ethernet interface.

Imported modules   
from pyVC.Networks.Base import Network
Classes   

Linux

This object defines a Network object for a Linux virtual network.
